List.SQL: SELECT ID010, NACHNAME010 AS Nachname, VORNAME010 AS Vorname, ANREDE010 AS Anrede, TITEL010 AS Titel, GEB010 AS Geburtstag , STATUS010 AS Status FROM RA010 ORDER BY NACHNAME010

SELECT ID010, NACHNAME010 AS Nachname, VORNAME010 AS Vorname, ANREDE010 AS Anrede, TITEL010 AS Titel, GEB010 AS Geburtstag , STATUS010 AS Status FROM RA010 WHERE RA010.STATUS010='Bewerber' ORDER BY NACHNAME010

SELECT ID010, NACHNAME010 AS Nachname, VORNAME010 AS Vorname, ANREDE010 AS Anrede, TITEL010 AS Titel, GEB010 AS Geburtstag, BESTELLT010 as Bestellt,AZ010 AS Aktenzeichen, AG010 AS Amtsgericht, LG010 AS Landgericht , STATUS010 AS Status FROM RA010 WHERE RA010.STATUS010='Notar' ORDER BY NACHNAME010

SubNode.Name: Notarebestellt
SubNode.Description: Notare die im aktuellen Jahr bestellt wurden

List.SQL: SELECT ID010, NACHNAME010 AS Nachname, VORNAME010 AS Vorname, ANREDE010 AS Anrede, TITEL010 AS Titel, GEB010 AS Geburtstag, BESTELLT010 as Bestellt,AZ010 AS Aktenzeichen, AG010 AS Amtsgericht, LG010 AS Landgericht , STATUS010 AS Status FROM RA010 WHERE RA010.STATUS010='Notar' ANd Year(bestellt010) = Year(getdate()) ORDER BY NACHNAME010

SELECT ID010, NACHNAME010 AS Nachname, VORNAME010 AS Vorname, ANREDE010 AS Anrede, TITEL010 AS Titel, GEB010 AS Geburtstag, BESTELLT010 as Bestellt, AZ010 AS Aktenzeichen,AG010 AS Amtsgericht, STATUS010 AS Status , AUSGESCH010 as AusgeschiedenAm FROM RA010 WHERE RA010.STATUS010='ausgeschieden' OR RA010.STATUS010='a. D.' ORDER BY NACHNAME010

SELECT ID020 AS IDJahr, JAHR020 AS Jahr, AZ020 AS Aktenzeichen, Count(Year(FRIST012)) AnzAusschreibungen FROM AUSSCHREIBUNG020 LEFT JOIN STELLEN012 ON ID020 = FK020012 GROUP BY ID020, AZ020, JAHR020 ORDER BY JAHR020

SubNode.Name: StellenJahr
SubNode.SQL: SELECT DISTINCT JAHR020 AS nodetext, ID020 AS nodekey, 'StellenJahr' AS nodetag FROM AUSSCHREIBUNG020

List.SQL: SELECT ID012 , BEZIRK012 As Bezirk, BESCH012 AS Beschreibung, AZ020 AS AZ, ANZ012 As AnzStellen, FRIST012 AS Bewerbungsfrist ,Count(CONVERT(varchar(40),ID013)) AS AnzBewerber FROM AUSSCHREIBUNG020 LEFT JOIN (STELLEN012 LEFT JOIN Bewerb013 ON ID012 = FK012013) ON ID020 = FK020012 GROUP BY ID012, BEZIRK012,BESCH012,AZ020,ANZ012,FRIST012 ORDER BY BEZIRK012

SubNode.SQL: SELECT ID012, BEZIRK012 As nodetext, ID012 As nodekey ,'*' AS nodetag FROM STELLEN012 ORDER BY BEZIRK012

List.SQL: SELECT ID012 , BEZIRK012 As Bezirk, BESCH012 AS Beschreibung, AZ020 AS AZ, ANZ012 As AnzStellen, FRIST012 AS Bewerbungsfrist ,Count(CONVERT(varchar(40),ID013)) AS AnzBewerber FROM AUSSCHREIBUNG020 LEFT JOIN (STELLEN012 LEFT JOIN Bewerb013 ON ID012 = FK012013) ON ID020 = FK020012 GROUP BY ID012, BEZIRK012,BESCH012,AZ020,ANZ012,FRIST012

SELECT ID013, (NACHNAME010 + ', ' + ISNULL(VORNAME010,'')) AS Bewerber, BEM013 AS Bemerkung , Rang013 As Rang, Cast(CONVERT(money,PUNKTESUM013)as varchar(30)) as Gesamtpunktzahl , BEZIRK012 AS Bezirk , CASE ZUSAGE013 WHEN -1 THEN 'Ja' WHEN 0 THEN 'Nein' END AS Zusage , ZUSAGE013, FK010013 as IDPers , FK012013 AS IDStelle FROM (BEWERB013 LEFT JOIN Stellen012 ON ID012 = FK012013) LEFT JOIN RA010 ON ID010 = FK010013 ORDER BY Rang013

SELECT ID018, CASE WHEN ALIAS018 IS NULL THEN Template018 ELSE ALIAS018 END as Anzeigename, NACHNAME010 + ', ' + ISNULL(Vorname010,'') AS Empfänger, Create018 AS ErstelltAm, DOCNAME018 AS Dokumentenname ,FK010018, FK012018 FROM DOC018 Left JOIN RA010 ON ID010 = FK010018 ORDER BY CREATE018 DESC

TreeNode.Name: Bewerbungen
TreeNode.SQL: SELECT ID013, (NACHNAME010 + ', ' + ISNULL(VORNAME010,'')) AS Bewerber , BEM013 AS Bemerkung , FRIST012 AS Bewerbungsfrist , BEZIRK012 AS Bezirk, RANG013 AS Rang, ID010 as IDPers FROM (BEWERB013 LEFT JOIN Stellen012 ON ID012 = FK012013) LEFT JOIN RA010 ON ID010 = FK010013

List.SQL: SELECT ID013, (NACHNAME010 + ', ' + ISNULL(VORNAME010,'')) AS Bewerber , BEM013 AS Bemerkung , EINGANG013 as Bewerbungsdatum, BEZIRK012 AS Bezirk, RANG013 AS Rang, CASE ZUSAGE013 WHEN -1 THEN 'Ja' WHEN 0 THEN 'Nein' END AS Zusage ,FRIST012 AS Bewerbungsfrist , ID010 as IDPers FROM (BEWERB013 LEFT JOIN Stellen012 ON ID012 = FK012013) LEFT JOIN RA010 ON ID010 = FK010013

SELECT ID018, CASE WHEN ALIAS018 IS NULL THEN Template018 ELSE ALIAS018 END as Anzeigename, NACHNAME010 + ', ' + ISNULL(Vorname010,'') AS Empfänger , BEZIRK012 + ' ' + CAST(Year(FRIST012) AS Varchar(5)) AS Stelle, CREATE018 as ErstelltAm , DOCNAME018 as Dokument, Template018 AS Vorlage FROM DOC018 LEFT JOIN STELLEN012 ON FK012018 = ID012 LEFT JOIN RA010 ON ID010 = FK010018 ORDER BY CREATE018 DESC

SubNode.Name: Letzte Woche
SubNode.Description: Liste aller Dokumente der letzen Woche

List.SQL: SELECT ID018, CASE WHEN ALIAS018 IS NULL THEN Template018 ELSE ALIAS018 END as Anzeigename, NACHNAME010 + ', ' + ISNULL(Vorname010,'') AS Empfänger, BEZIRK012 + ' ' + CAST(Year(FRIST012) AS Varchar(5)) AS Stelle, CREATE018 as ErstelltAm, DOCNAME018 as Dokument, Template018 AS Vorlage FROM DOC018 LEFT JOIN STELLEN012 ON FK012018 = ID012 LEFT JOIN RA010 ON ID010 = FK010018 WHERE CREATE018>= Getdate()-7 ORDER BY CREATE018 DESC

SubNode.Name: Letzter Monat
SubNode.Description: Liste aller Dokumente des letzen Monats

List.SQL: SELECT ID018, CASE WHEN ALIAS018 IS NULL THEN Template018 ELSE ALIAS018 END as Anzeigename, NACHNAME010 + ', ' + ISNULL(Vorname010,'') AS Empfänger, BEZIRK012 + ' ' + CAST(Year(FRIST012) AS Varchar(5)) AS Stelle, CREATE018 as ErstelltAm , DOCNAME018 as Dokument, Template018 AS Vorlage FROM DOC018 LEFT JOIN STELLEN012 ON FK012018 = ID012 LEFT JOIN RA010 ON ID010 = FK010018 WHERE CREATE018>= Getdate()-30

SELECT ID024, '', FRIST024 AS Fristdatum, BEMERKUNG024 AS Bemerkung, (NACHNAME010 + ', ' + ISNULL(VORNAME010,'')) AS Person, CREATE024 AS ErstelltAm FROM FRIST024 INNER JOIN RA010 ON ID010 = FK010024 ORDER BY FRIST024 DESC

SELECT ID024, '',FRIST024 AS Fristdatum, BEMERKUNG024 AS Bemerkung , (NACHNAME010 + ', ' + ISNULL(VORNAME010,'')) AS Person, CREATE024 AS ErstelltAm FROM FRIST024 INNER JOIN RA010 ON ID010 = FK010024 WHERE FRIST024 between getdate()-1 and getdate() ORDER BY FRIST024 DESC

SELECT ID024, '',FRIST024 AS Fristdatum, BEMERKUNG024 AS Bemerkung , (NACHNAME010 + ', ' + ISNULL(VORNAME010,'')) AS Person, CREATE024 AS ErstelltAm FROM FRIST024 INNER JOIN RA010 ON ID010 = FK010024 WHERE FRIST024 between getdate() and getdate()+1 ORDER BY FRIST024 DESC

SELECT ID024, '', FRIST024 AS Fristdatum, BEMERKUNG024 AS Bemerkung , (NACHNAME010 + ', ' + ISNULL(VORNAME010,'')) AS Person, CREATE024 AS ErstelltAm FROM FRIST024 INNER JOIN RA010 ON ID010 = FK010024 WHERE FRIST024 < getdate()-1 ORDER BY FRIST024 DESC

SubNode.Name: Gesamt pro Bezirk
SubNode.Description: Anzahl der Notare pro LG Bezirk

List.SQL: Select ID003, LGNAME003 AS Landgericht ,COUNT(*) AS Anzahl FROM RA010 INNER JOIN LG003 ON LG010 = LGNAME003 WHERE STATUS010 = 'Notar' GROUP BY ID003, LGNAME003 ORDER BY LGNAME003

SubNode.Name: Gesamt pro AG
SubNode.Description: Anzahl der Notare pro AG Bezirk

List.SQL: Select ID004, LGNAME003 AS Landgericht, AGNAME004 AS Amtsgericht ,COUNT(*) AS Anzahl FROM RA010 INNER JOIN (AG004 LEFT JOIN LG003 ON FK003004 =ID003 ) ON AG010 = AGNAME004 WHERE STATUS010 = 'Notar' GROUP BY ID004, LGNAME003, AGNAME004 ORDER BY LGNAME003, AGNAME004

SELECT 5 as Orderby, '> 70' AS Altersgruppe , Count(*) as Anzahl FROM RA010 WHERE geb010 between DATEADD(year,-100,Getdate()) AND DATEADD(year,-70,getdate()) AND RA010.STATUS010='Notar' UNION SELECT 10 as Orderby, '65 - 70' AS Altersgruppe , Count(*) as Anzahl FROM RA010 WHERE geb010 between DATEADD(year,-70,Getdate()) AND DATEADD(year,-65,getdate()) AND RA010.STATUS010='Notar' UNION SELECT 15 as Orderby, '60 - 64' AS Altersgruppe, Count(*) as Anzahl FROM RA010 WHERE geb010 between DATEADD(year,-65,Getdate()) AND DATEADD(year,-60,getdate()) AND RA010.STATUS010='Notar' UNION SELECT 20 as Orderby, '55 - 59' AS Altersgruppe, Count(*) as Anzahl FROM RA010 WHERE geb010 between DATEADD(year,-60,Getdate()) AND DATEADD(year,-55,getdate()) AND RA010.STATUS010='Notar' UNION SELECT 25 as Orderby,'50 - 54' AS Altersgruppe, Count(*) as Anzahl FROM RA010 WHERE geb010 between DATEADD(year,-55,Getdate()) AND DATEADD(year,-50,getdate()) AND RA010.STATUS010='Notar' UNION SELECT 30 as Orderby, '45 - 49' AS Altersgruppe, Count(*) as Anzahl FROM RA010 WHERE geb010 between DATEADD(year,-50,Getdate()) AND DATEADD(year,-45,getdate()) AND RA010.STATUS010='Notar' UNION SELECT 35 as Orderby,'39 - 44' AS Altersgruppe, Count(*) as Anzahl FROM RA010 WHERE geb010 between DATEADD(year,-45,Getdate()) AND DATEADD(year,-39,getdate()) AND RA010.STATUS010='Notar' UNION SELECT 40 as Orderby,'< 39' AS Altersgruppe, Count(*) as Anzahl FROM RA010 WHERE geb010 between DATEADD(year,-39,Getdate()) AND getdate() AND RA010.STATUS010='Notar' UNION SELECT 45 as Orderby,'ohne Geburtsdatum' AS Altersgruppe, Count(*) as Anzahl FROM RA010 WHERE ISNULL(geb010,'')='' AND RA010.STATUS010='Notar' ORDER BY Orderby
SELECT ID002, OLGNAME002 AS OLG,OLGSTR002 AS Strasse, OLGPLZ002 AS PLZ, OLGORT002 as Ort FROM OLG002
SELECT ID003, LGNAME003 AS Landgericht,LGSTR003 AS Strasse, LGPLZ003 AS PLZ, LGORT003 as Ort, OLGName002 as OLGBezirk FROM LG003 INNER JOIN OLG002 ON FK002003 = ID002

SELECT ID004, AGNAME004 AS Amtsgericht,AGSTR004 AS Strasse, AGPLZ004 AS PLZ, AGORT004 as Ort , LGNAME003 as Bezirk FROM (AG004 INNER JOIN LG003 ON FK003004 = ID003) INNER JOIN OLG002 ON FK002003 = ID002

SELECT ID001, USERNAME001 as Benutzername, VORNAME001 as Vorname, Nachname001 as Nachname, tel001 as Telefon, fax001 as Telefax, email001 as Email, CASE SYSTEM001 WHEN 0 Then 'Nein' WHEN -1 THEN 'Ja' END AS Systemverwalter FROM USER001

Oberlandesgerichte.Name: Oberlandesgerichte
Oberlandesgerichte.SQL: SELECT OLGNAME002 AS Name, OLGSTR002 AS Str, OLGPLZ002 AS PLZ, OLGORT002 AS Ort, OLGMAIL002 AS Mail, OLGTEL002 AS Tel, OLGFAX002 AS Fax, '' AS BezirkID, MODIFY002 AS MODIFY,CREATE002 AS DATECREATE, CFROM002 AS CFROM , MFROM002 AS MFROM, ID002 AS ID FROM OLG002

Landgerichte.Name: Landgerichte
Landgerichte.SQL: SELECT LGNAME003 AS Name, LGSTR003 AS Str, LGPLZ003 AS PLZ, LGORT003 AS Ort, LGMAIL003 AS Mail, LGTEL003 AS Tel, LGFAX003 AS Fax, FK002003 AS BezirkID, MODIFY003 AS MODIFY,CREATE003 AS DATECREATE, CFROM003 AS CFROM , MFROM003 AS MFROM, ID003 AS ID FROM LG003

Amtsgerichte.Name: Amtsgerichte
Amtsgerichte.SQL: SELECT AGNAME004 AS Name, AGSTR004 AS Str, AGPLZ004 AS PLZ, AGORT004 AS Ort, AGMAIL004 AS Mail, AGTEL004 AS Tel, AGFAX004 AS Fax, FK003004 AS BezirkID, MODIFY004 AS MODIFY,CREATE004 AS DATECREATE, CFROM004 AS CFROM , MFROM004 AS MFROM, ID004 AS ID FROM AG004

Relation.Name: Ausgeschriebene Stellen
Relation.SQL: SELECT ID012, BEZIRK012 AS Bezirk, FRIST012 as Bewerbungsfrist, ANZ012 As AnzStellen ,Count(CONVERT(varchar(40),ID013)) AS AnzBewerber FROM STELLEN012 LEFT JOIN BEWERB013 ON ID012 = FK012013 GROUP BY ID012, BEZIRK012, FRIST012, ANZ012 ORDER BY BEZIRK012

Relation.Name: Dokumente
Relation.SQL: SELECT ID018, CASE WHEN ALIAS018 IS NULL THEN Template018 ELSE ALIAS018 END as Anzeigename, NACHNAME010 + ', ' + ISNULL(Vorname010,'') AS Empfänger, BEZIRK012 As Bezirk, Create018 AS ErstelltAm , DOCNAME018 AS Dokumentenname ,FK010018, FK012018 FROM DOC018 Left JOIN RA010 ON ID010 = FK010018 LEFT JOIN STELLEN012 ON FK012018 = ID012 ORDER BY CREATE018 DESC

AusgeschriebeneStellen.Name: Ausgeschriebene Stellen
AusgeschriebeneStellen.SQL: SELECT * FROM STELLEN012 INNER JOIN AUSSCHREIBUNG020 On ID020 = FK020012

Relation.Name: Dokumente
Relation.SQL: SELECT ID018, CASE WHEN ALIAS018 IS NULL THEN Template018 ELSE ALIAS018 END as Anzeigename, NACHNAME010 + ', ' + ISNULL(Vorname010,'') AS Empfänger, Create018 AS ErstelltAm, DOCNAME018 AS Dokumentenname ,FK010018, FK012018 FROM DOC018 Left JOIN RA010 ON ID010 = FK010018 ORDER BY CREATE018 DESC

Relation.Name: Bewerbungen
Relation.SQL: SELECT ID013, (NACHNAME010 + ', ' + ISNULL(VORNAME010,'')) AS Bewerber, BEM013 AS Bemerkung , Rang013 As Rang, Cast(CONVERT(money,PUNKTESUM013)as varchar(30)) as Punkte, CASE ZUSAGE013 WHEN -1 THEN 'Ja' WHEN 0 THEN 'Nein' END AS Zusage , ZUSAGE013, FK010013 as IDPers , FK012013 AS IDStelle FROM (BEWERB013 LEFT JOIN Stellen012 ON ID012 = FK012013) LEFT JOIN RA010 ON ID010 = FK010013 ORDER BY Rang013

Relation.Name: Bewerbungen
Relation.SQL: SELECT ID013, BEZIRK012 AS Bezirk ,BESCH012 AS Beschreibung, FRIST012 AS Bewerbungsfrist, PUNKTESUM013 AS Gesamtpunktzahl,PUNKTESUM013, PUNKTE01013, PUNKTE02013, PUNKTE03013, PUNKTE04013, FK010013, FK012013 FROM BEWERB013 LEFT JOIN STELLEN012 ON ID012 = FK012013

Relation.Name: Dokumente
Relation.SQL: SELECT ID018, CASE WHEN ALIAS018 IS NULL THEN Template018 ELSE ALIAS018 END AS Anzeigename, Create018 AS ErstelltAm , BEZIRK012 + ' ' + CAST(Year(FRIST012) AS Varchar(5)) AS Stelle, DOCNAME018 AS Dokumentenname ,FK010018 FROM DOC018 LEFT JOIN STELLEN012 ON FK012018 = ID012 ORDER BY CREATE018 DESC

Relation.Name: Aktenort
Relation.SQL: SELECT ID017, Create017 AS Eingetragen,AKTENORT017 AS Standort,FK010017 , FK013017 FROM AKTENORT017 ORDER BY CREATE017 DESC

Relation.Name: Disziplinarmaßnahmen
Relation.SQL: SELECT ID019, DATUM019 AS Datum , MASSNAHME019 AS Maßnahme, VERSTOSS019 AS Verstoß ,FK010019 FROM DISZ019

Relation.Name: Forderungen
Relation.SQL: SELECT ID022, GLAEUBIGER022 AS Gläubiger, BETRAG022 AS Betrag ,FK010022 FROM FORD022

Relation.Name: Fristen
Relation.SQL: SELECT ID024, FRIST024 AS Fristdatum, BEMERKUNG024 AS Bermerkung ,FK010024 FROM FRIST024

Personen.SQL: SELECT ID010, NACHNAME010 AS Nachname ,VORNAME010 AS Vorname ,STATUS010 AS Status ,ANREDE010 AS Anrede ,TITEL010 AS Titel FROM RA010 ORDER BY NACHNAME010

PersonenNachStellen.SQL: SELECT ID010, NACHNAME010 AS Nachname ,VORNAME010 AS Vorname ,STATUS010 AS Status ,ANREDE010 AS Anrede ,TITEL010 AS Titel FROM RA010 INNER JOIN BEWERB013 ON (FK010013 = ID010) INNER JOIN STELLEN012 ON (FK012013 = ID012 ) ORDER BY NACHNAME010

Bewerber.SQL: SELECT ID010, NACHNAME010 AS Nachname ,VORNAME010 AS Vorname ,ANREDE010 AS Anrede ,TITEL010 AS Titel FROM RA010 WHERE Status010 = 'Bewerber' ORDER BY NACHNAME010

Notare.SQL: SELECT ID010, NACHNAME010 AS Nachname ,VORNAME010 AS Vorname ,ANREDE010 AS Anrede ,TITEL010 AS Titel FROM RA010 WHERE Status010 = 'Notar' ORDER BY NACHNAME010

Dokumente.SQL: SELECT ID018 , DOCNAME018 as Dokument,CASE WHEN ALIAS018 IS NULL THEN Template018 ELSE ALIAS018 END as Anzeigename, Template018 as vorlage, CREATE018 AS Erstellt ,Nachname010 + ', ' + Vorname010 as Empfänger FROM DOC018 INNER JOIN RA010 On ID010 = FK010018

Stellen.SQL: SELECT ID012,BEZIRK012 AS LGBezirk ,BESCH012 AS Beschreibung ,ANZ012 AS AnzStellen,FRIST012 AS Bewerbungsfrist FROM STELLEN012

Ausschreibungen.SQL: SELECT ID020,AZ020 AS Aktenzeichen ,Jahr020 AS Jahr FROM AUSSCHREIBUNG020

StellenNachAusschreibung.SQL: SELECT ID012,BEZIRK012 AS LGBezirk ,BESCH012 AS Beschreibung ,ANZ012 AS AnzStellen,FRIST012 AS Bewerbungsfrist, AZ020 + ' (' + CAST(JAHR020 AS varchar(5)) + ')' AS Ausschreibung FROM STELLEN012 INNER JOIN AUSSCHREIBUNG020 ON ID020 = FK020012

Mitbewerber.SQL: SELECT * FROM MitbewerberDaten ORDER BY MitbewerberRang

MitbewerberZusage.SQL: SELECT * FROM MitbewerberZugesagtDaten ORDER BY ZMitbewerberRang

MitbewerberAbsage.SQL: SELECT * FROM MitbewerberAbgesagtDaten ORDER BY AMitbewerberRang
